name: leaflet-schematic
description: Leaflet SVG viewer for non-cartographic high-detailed schematics

scripts.start: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.SVGOverlay demo/js/index.js -o demo/js/build.js & serve -p 3002
scripts.build-js: browserify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.SVGOverlay -u leaflet ./index.js -o dist/L.SVGOverlay.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-js

author: Alexander Milevski <info@w8r.name>
